title: "Scientists can tell where a mouse is looking and located based on its neural activity"
excerpt: "Researchers have paired a deep learning model with experimental data to 'decode' mouse neural activity. Using the method, they can accurately determine where a mouse is located within an open environment and which direction it is facing,"
